TopicTitle: you know a universe is dying when...

Articles.Content: 1. When you divide by zero
2. Jeb isn't smiling.
3. there are no more boosters.
4. When you've sucked every last drop of kethane from each planet and Jools kethane atmosphere is reduced to a mere highly dense rock core and its moons orbit the sun as separate planets
5. The Kraken's body on Bop (or wherever it is, I can't remember) suddenly disappears... and you realize that it has returned.
6. You wake up died
7) Proton decay takes your atoms apart
8. When even whackjobs computer can't handle it
9. When the NYSE shuts down.
10. When NASA gets a better budget and realistic goals.
11. SpaceX doesn't scrub this launch
When jebediah kerman gets bored of SRB's and starts using oxygen and nitrogen for his SRB's. and christened them ARB's. (Air Rocket Boosters)
When you can land on Jool or Kerbol.

14. When you turn off your warp drive from ksp interstellar and your flying through sentars soi at 8374284 m/s

(I had it happen)
15. When the last black hole looks like a very tiny but bright star.
16. When the universe is collapsing

17: When your craft melts down your computer. Planet Earth.

HHGTTG Reference
18. When jeb dies
when you don't see a single thing relating to My little Pony on a popular internet site for one day

...

When a well-known fourth wall traveler don't smile for a unobvious reason

...
When the kraken consumes Kerbin and Jeb becomes our last hope of defending us
When the kerbal universe catches fire (kerbal universe=your computer)
When the TARDIS goes boom
When you switch AUX to SCE
when you converse with your future self
